venue.address_2: Mammoth Rd. & S. Willow also called Rt.28A Manchester
venue.name: The Yard Seafood & Steak House

item.description:
I will be dancing here tonight, so for some fun and dancing feel free to come and join Natalie, myself and bunch other peeps!!

 

Howdy! BOBBY CARLSON AND STONES RIVER is gonna rock the bar this Saturday nite...Midnight Rodeo Bar. If you are looking to meeting new people this is the place! Come join us! There is a meetup table located near the bar or feel free to sit with your friends. See ya there for a boot scoot'in good time!
$10.00 cover charge
21 +
Lessons with Michelle at 7:30 PM, Band goes on at 9 PM

DJ Rich....between sets
item.how_to_find_us: Will leave my cell to help peeps find us 978-857-6626
item.name: Last Minute Event "Line Dancing at the Yard Tonight"
